Actions.Name: Bar Brawler
Actions.Description:
The [name] takes a fighting stance, with the following benefits:
• They gain counter and sturdy.
• Any time a foe ends their turn adjacent to the [name] in this stance, they take 2 piercing damage and are shoved 1.
• If a foe collides with the [name], they take 2 piercing damage and are shoved 1, but only once a round.

Actions.Name: Barrel Roll
Actions.AreaEffect: 2 damage, and shove 2 away from the origin point. At round 3+, becomes a large blast and any character in the center space must save or become stunned.
